fr: What was that? You have flying enemies now?
[b]Low-level anomaly detected.[/b] Looks like you're dealing with an old annoyance: a joke virus.
Joke virus? That doesn’t sound too dangerous. Or didn't seem to be.
It’s not. But it is incredibly [i]annoying[/i]. These things were designed to pop up fake alerts, reverse controls, or blast sound files at random. No real harm, just chaos.
In this simulation, you’ll probably experience flickers, fake messages, maybe even reversed buttons. It’s like being trolled by the OS itself.
So I’m getting punked by malware. Great.
Exactly. Not every threat is lethal. Some just want to waste your time and make you question reality.
